parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True appends the selection list, false replaces the selection list

parameters.name: Mark
parameters.description: Value you want to use as a mark

title: IBomTable.Select
description: Selects this BOM table and marks it.
signature:
System.Boolean Select( 
   System.Boolean
Append
,
   System.Int32
Mark
)

parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True appends the selection list, false replaces the selection list

parameters.name: Mark
parameters.description: Value you want to use as a mark

returns: True if the BOM table is selected, false if not
remarks:
Before you use any of the IBomTable methods, activate the BOM table using
IBomTable::Attach3
. After you finish getting BOM data, use
IBomTable::Detach
to deactivate the table.
